org.nlpcraft.model

Interface NCProbeContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface NCProbeContext
extends Serializable
    Probe runtime context. Instance of this interface is passed to the model via NCModel.initialize(NCProbeContext) method when model is initialized for the first time by the probe.
    See Also:
    NCModel.initialize(NCProbeContext)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDownLink()
      Gets downlink endpoint for this probe.
      String getId()
      Gets ID of the probe.
      String getJarsFolder()
      Gets optional folder to scan for model JARs.
      List<String> getModelProviders()
      Gets model provider classes, potentially empty.
      String getToken()
      Gets probe token.
      String getUpLink()
      Gets uplink endpoint for this probe.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Gets ID of the probe.
        Returns:
        ID of the probe.

      • getToken

        String getToken()
        Gets probe token. This token should be kept secure.
        Returns:
        Probe token.

      • getUpLink

        String getUpLink()
        Gets uplink endpoint for this probe.
        Returns:
        Uplink endpoint for this probe.

      • getDownLink

        String getDownLink()
        Gets downlink endpoint for this probe.
        Returns:
        Downlink endpoint for this probe.

      • getJarsFolder

        String getJarsFolder()
        Gets optional folder to scan for model JARs.
        Returns:
        Optional folder to scan for model JARs.

      • getModelProviders

        List<String> getModelProviders()
        Gets model provider classes, potentially empty.
        Returns:
        List of model provider fully qualified class names, potentially empty, this probe was configured with.
